section.name: Overview
section.p: Commons JXPath uses Maven 1, Maven 2 (preferred), or Ant as a build system.

section.name: Maven 2 Goals
section.p: The following Maven 2 commands can be used to build Commons JXPath:

ul.li: mvn test - compile and run the unit tests
mvn site - create Commons JXPath documentation
mvn install - build the jar and install in local maven repository
mvn site assembly:assembly - Create the source and binary distributions

section.name: Maven 1 Goals
section.p: The following Maven 1 commands can be used to build Commons JXPath:

ul.li: maven test - compile and run the unit tests
maven site - create Commons JXPath documentation
maven dist - Create the source and binary distributions

section.name: Ant Goals

ul.li: Dependencies are automatically downloaded if not specified explicitly in a build.properties file.

section.p: The following Ant commands can be used to build Commons JXPath:

ul.li: ant test - compile and run the unit tests
ant dist - Create the source and binary distributions
